name: ORS Prisoners Without a Social Visit for a Date Range
description:
VIS0018 - v00.00.03 Last Modified: 23/10/2019
This report provides a list of prisoners who have not had a Social visit between the dates specified at runtime.The report shows data over 4 tabs - By Surname, By Location, By Age and address. It should be noted that only prisoners with a visit status of Normal Completion will be counted as having a visit.

dataset.name: No Visits
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE_IN_YEARS, AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFICER AS OFFICER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK AT_HEADER_BLOCK, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END IN ('Social') AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END = 'Normal Completion' AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE >= (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Last Visit Date (From):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE <= (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Last Visit Date (To):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, AGE_IN_YEARS, OFFICER, CURRENT_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS V_EFFECTIVE_SENT_LENGTH, UPPER(PERSONAL_OFFICER) AS V_PERSONAL_OFFICER, CASE WHEN V_MULTIVALUE_POM = 1 THEN 'MULTIPLE ENTRIES, PLEASE CHECK' ELSE V_PRISON_OFFENDER_MANAGER END AS V_POM_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN V_MULTIVALUE_OS = 1 THEN 'MULTIPLE ENTRIES, PLEASE CHECK' ELSE V_OFFENDER_SUPERVISOR END AS V_OS_DISPLAY, PREMISES + ' ' + FLAT + ' ' + STREET + ' ' + AREA + ' ' + POSTAL_CODE AS V_ADDRESS, NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG AS V_NFA_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Last Social Visit
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END AS VISIT_TYPE_HELD FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END IN ('Social') AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END = 'Normal Completion' AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Last Visit Date (From):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Last Visit Date (To):','D',,Mono,Free,Persistent,,User:1) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, VISIT_DATE, VISIT_TYPE_HELD FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Address
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION) || ' ' END || CASE WHEN (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION) END AS AREA, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.FLAT AS FLAT, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.STREET AS STREET, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY AS LOCALITY, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.POSTAL_CODE AS POSTAL_CODE, AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION AS CITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG AS NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG, AT_ADDRESS_TYPES.DESCRIPTION AS ADDRESS_DESCRIPTION, DT_LATEST_HOME_ADDRESS.PREMISES AS PREMISES FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_CITY, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ADDRESS_TYPES, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.FLAT, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.PREMISE AS PREMISES, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.STREET, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY, AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DESCRIPTION AS CITY, AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DESCRIPTION AS COUNTY, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.POSTAL_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_CITY, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES WHERE AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID AND AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.CODE = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.CITY_CODE AND AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN = 'CITY' AND AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.CODE = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_CODE AND AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN = 'COUNTY' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.owner_id, AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.create_datetime) IN (SELECT ads.owner_id, MAX(ads.create_datetime) FROM OMS_OWNER.ADDRESSES ads, OMS_OWNER.ADDRESS_USAGES adsus WHERE adsus.ADDRESS_ID = ads.ADDRESS_ID AND adsus.ADDRESS_USAGE = 'HOME' AND adsus.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY ads.owner_id)) DT_LATEST_HOME_ADDRESS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.ADDRESS_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.CITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN = 'CITY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_CITY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN = 'COUNTY' OR AT_OFF_ADD_COUNTY.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_ADDRESS_TYPES.DOMAIN = 'ADDRESS_TYPE') AND (AT_ADDRESS_TYPES.CODE = AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ADDRESS_USAGE) AND (DT_LATEST_HOME_ADDRESS.OWNER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESSES.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER_ADDRESS_USAGES.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AREA, FLAT, STREET, LOCALITY, POSTAL_CODE, DESCRIPTION, CITY_DESCRIPTION, NO_FIXED_ADDRESS_FLAG, ADDRESS_DESCRIPTION, PREMISES FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN.CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN AS CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, AT_OFFENCES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.COURT_EVENTS AT_OFFENDER_COURT_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT OFF_BOOK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN LIFE_FLAG.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Life' ELSE SENT_CALC.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH END AS CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN FROM (SELECT DISTINCT OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG FROM OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS WHERE OFFENDER_SENTENCE_TERMS.LIFE_SENTENCE_FLAG = 'Y') LIFE_FLAG, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS SENT_CALC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS OFF_BOOK WHERE (OFF_BOOK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (LIFE_FLAG.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE SENT_CALC.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, OMS_OWNER.OFFENCES AT_OFFENCES, OMS_OWNER.COURT_EVENT_CHARGES AT_COURT_EVENT_CHARGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CHARGES AT_OFFENDER_CHARGES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASES AT_OFFENDER_CASES WHERE (AT_COURT_EVENT_CHARGES.EVENT_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_COURT_EVENTS.EVENT_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CHARGES.OFFENDER_CHARGE_ID (+) = AT_COURT_EVENT_CHARGES.OFFENDER_CHARGE_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_COURT_EVENTS.CASE_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASES.CASE_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CHARGES.OFFENCE_CODE = AT_OFFENCES.OFFENCE_CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_COURT_EVENT_CHARGES.MOST_SERIOUS_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CURR_EFF_SENT_LEN, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: OS
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE = 'OFS' AND AT_CONTACTS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: POM
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_PEOPLE.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_PEOPLE.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.PERSONS AT_PEOPLE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSONS AT_CONTACTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_CONTACTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_PEOPLE.PERSON_ID (+) = AT_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP_TYPE = 'POM' AND AT_CONTACTS.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Rotl
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) AS MOVEMENT_DATE_, AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.MOVEMENT_REASONS AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_TYPE AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE = 'TAP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, MOVEMENT_DATE_, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:v_Max_Visit_date
field.formula: =Max([Date of Visit]) In ([Last Social Visit].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:v_Max_Visit_date
field.formula: =Max([Date of Visit]) In ([Last Social Visit].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:v_Max_Visit_date
field.formula: =Max([Date of Visit]) In ([Last Social Visit].[NOMS Number])

field.name: $ref:v_Max_Visit_date
field.formula: =Max([Date of Visit]) In ([Last Social Visit].[NOMS Number])
